org.deeplearning4j.spark.earlystopping

Class SparkDataSetLossCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.spark.earlystopping.SparkDataSetLossCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ScoreCalculator<MultiLayerNetwork>

    public class SparkDataSetLossCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScoreCalculator<MultiLayerNetwork>
    Score calculator to calculate the total loss for the MultiLayerNetwork on that data set (data set as a JavaRDD), using Spark. Typically used to calculate the loss on a test set.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SparkDataSetLossCalculator(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<DataSet> data, boolean average, org.apache.spark.SparkContext sc)
      Calculate the score (loss function value) on a given data set (usually a test set)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SparkDataSetLossCalculator

        public SparkDataSetLossCalculator(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<DataSet> data,
                                  boolean average,
                                  org.apache.spark.SparkContext sc)
        Calculate the score (loss function value) on a given data set (usually a test set)
        Parameters:
        data - Data set to calculate the score for
        average - Whether to return the average (sum of loss / N) or just (sum of loss)

      • minimizeScore

        public boolean minimizeScore()
        Specified by:
        minimizeScore in interface ScoreCalculator<MultiLayerNetwork>
        Returns:
        If true: the score should be minimized. If false: the score should be maximized.
